user_query: Your little girl is coming with me, Adah. 6:00 a.m. tomorrow. Bring half a million in cash. You really don't want to be late. >> Why, Charlotte? >> They know what you are. >> They've taken Charlotte. >> I'm going to fix it. Brought some backup. So, which one of you bellies is going to explain to me what is going on here? There's a lot going on in London tonight.
